那么你听到了这样的吟唱声——
{旧日颂歌事件}

那可怕的嗡嗡声与人类的说话声毫无相似之处
这种声音无论是音色还是音程都完全脱离了人类发音
你无法将这种发音形象地描述出来……
它是如此突兀
如同梦魇般缠绕着你
将你拉进绝望的深渊。
旧日颂歌事件:
Look to the sky, way up on high
望向天空 高高在上
There in the night stars are now right.群星归位之时已至
Eons have passed: now then at last
昔时已逝 末日正临
Prison walls break, Old Ones awake!
封印已经毁坏 旧日支配者醒来
Madness will reign, terror and pain
疯狂将统治恐惧与伤痛
Woes without end where they extend.
他们所处之地将是无尽悲哀
Ignorant fools, mankind now rules
无知与愚蠢 成为新主宰
Where they ruled then: it's theirs again
他们所在之处 他们就是规则
Stars brightly burning, boiling and churning
星耀且灼热 沸腾并颤动
Bode a returning season of doom
预示末日到来
Scary scary scary scary solstice
恐怖恐怖恐怖至极
Very very very scary solstice
极度极度恐怖至极
Up from the sea, from underground
从海底升起 从地下涌出
Down from the sky, they're all around.
从天空降下 他们无处不在
Fear
恐惧吧
Look to the sky, way up on high
望向天空 高高在上
There in the night stars now are right
群星归位之时已至
They will return.
他们终将回来。

You know Deep Ones
你们都知道深潜者
And Dark Young and Shantaks and Shoggoths
黑山羊幼崽和夏塔克鸟以及修格斯
Nightgaunts and Polyps
夜魇和飞水螅
And Fungi from Yuggoth
还有犹格斯真菌
But do you recall
但是你们可曾记得
The most loathesome beastie of all?
其中最可憎的生灵是什么？
Freddie the Red Brained Mi-Go
红脑米戈弗莱迪
Had a very slimy brain,
有一个黏糊糊的脑子
And if you ever saw it,
如果你不幸看到
you would scream and go insane.
将会尖叫并疯掉
All of the other Mi-Go
其他米戈全部
Laughed at him and made remarks.
嘲笑他并说三道四
They never let poor Freddy
他们从来不让可怜的弗莱迪
Whisper with them in the dark.
和他们一起暗夜呢喃……

Awake ye scary Great Olde Ones
 let everything dismay.唤醒恐怖的旧日支配者
让一切绝望
Remember great Cthulhu shall rise up from R'lyeh
牢记伟大的克苏鲁会从拉莱耶醒来
To kill us all with tentacles if we should go his way.
如果我们讨喜就用触手杀死我们
Oh tidings of madness and woe.
啊疯狂与苦痛的潮汐
In Yuggoth and in Aldebraan the Great Olde Ones were spawned.
孵化在犹格斯和毕宿五的旧日支配者
Imprisoned by the Elder Gods to wait for long aeons.
被旧神囚禁而等待万古
Enticing humans to release them
 chanting dreadful songs.吟诵可怕的歌曲
诱惑人们释放他们
Oh tidings of madness and woe.
啊疯狂与苦痛的潮汐
An Arab said “That is not dead which can eternal lie,”
一个阿拉伯人说“那永恒长眠的并非亡者”
“And in strange aeons you will find that even death may die. ”
“在诡异的万古中即使死亡本身也会消逝”
The Great Olde Ones will rule once more and all will be destroyed!
旧日支配者将再度统治
将一切毁灭
Oh tidings of madness and woe.
啊疯狂与苦痛的潮汐。

The Deep Ones wait you know
深潜者等你知道
Swimming in the sea
在海中游泳
Their numbers they will grow
它们的数量将会增加
Swimming safe and free
游得自在而安全
He's not dead
 but yet dreams
他还没死
但还在做梦
Until that fateful day
直到那重大的那天
When they set the Old Ones free
当他们将旧日支配者释放
On mankind's final day!
人类的最后一天
Oh! Cthulhu lives
哦
克苏鲁还活着
Cthulhu lives
克苏鲁还活着
deep down in the sea
在深深的海里
In the city of R'lyeh
在拉莱耶城
waiting to be freed.
等待被释放
Hey!
嗨
Cthulhu lives
克苏鲁还活着
Cthulhu lives
克苏鲁还活着
deep down in the sea
在深深的海里
In the city of R'lyeh
在拉莱耶城
waiting to be freed.
等待被释放。

Death to the world! Cthulhu's come
普世沦丧！克苏鲁下降
Let Earth abhor this thing.
大地厌憎此妖妄
Let every mind prepare for doom
惟愿众心迎灭亡
As anguish
 as anguish and woe he'll bring.
因祂带来痛苦 痛苦与悲伤
Up from the sea
 R'lyeh did rise
来自海底 拉莱耶升上
The cultists awestruck dumb.
邪徒敬畏不言语
With ancient rites so wretched and perverse
 (So foul and base.)
古迹恶劣又癫狂（污秽又下劣）
Cthulhu
 Cthulhu's time has come.
克苏鲁的时代正开场！

I had a little shoggoth
我有只小修叽
I conjured up one day.召唤了一整天
I used an elder sigil
我用了个旧印
So shoggoth and I play.所以修叽陪我玩
Shoggoth shoggoth shoggoth
修格斯 修格斯 修格斯
With mouths and pseudopods.
嘴巴和伪足
Shoggoth shoggoth shoggoth
修格斯 修格斯 修格斯
Foul creature of the gods.
神的邪恶生物
One day while we were playing
某天我们一起玩
My monstrous pal broke free.
我的小怪物重获自由
I'd dropped the elder sigil
我弄丢了旧印
Li'l shoggy turned on me.
小修叽朝我扑来
Shoggoth shoggoth shoggoth
修格斯 修格斯 修格斯
He ripped me to a shred.
把我撕成碎片
Shoggoth shoggoth shoggoth
修格斯 修格斯 修格斯
We played and now I'm dead.
现在我死掉了。

Oh Cthulhu! Oh Cthulhu!
Ph'nglui w'gah nagul fhtagn!
Oh Cthulhu! (w'gah nagul fhtagn!)
Ph'nglui w'gah nagul fhtagn!(Oh Cthulhu! Oh Cthulhu!)
Great Cthulhu!
The domain of the Earth
Shall become
The domain of Cthulhu and his kind (And of his kind)
And he shall rise abhorrent and ancient(Andabhorrent and ancient)
Beasts of beasts(abhorrent and ancient)(Oh Cthulhu! Oh Cthulhu!)
And great Old one(abhorrent and ancient)(Oh Cthulhu! Oh Cthulhu!)
Beasts of beast and great Old One
And he shall rise abhorrent and ancient(And he shall rise abhorrent and ancient)
Beasts of beasts
And great Old one
And he shall rise abhorrent and ancient(And he shall rise abhorrent and ancient)
Abhorrent and ancient(Beasts of beasts)
Abhorrent and ancient(And great Old one)
Oh Cthulhu!

Have yourself a scary little Solstice: it's a long dark night.
度过恐惧的小小极限：长夜漫漫
Now's the time when horror's at its greatest height.
现在是战栗的最高点
Have yourself a scary little Solstice: chaos all around.
度过恐惧的小小极限：混沌遍布
Now's the time when terror's at its most profound.
现在是恐怖的最极致
Stars return as in older days
 as foretold in crazy lore.
狂人知识预言中的群星归位之日
Great Old Ones gather near to us
 giving fear to us once more.
旧日支配者聚集周围 使我们更加恐惧
If we're lucky this year we'll survive it and get through somehow.
如果我们今年运气好就能活下去
Hand an elder sign upon the highest bough.
在最高的树枝上挂起旧印
And have yourself a scary little Solstice.
度过小小的极度恐惧。

Silent Night
 Blasphemous Night
平安夜 亵渎的夜晚
People quake at the sight
人们在眼前战栗
Monsters rising from Deep R'lyeh
怪物从深渊拉莱耶浮出
People screaming 'please go away'
人们尖叫“请走开”
Great Cthulhu has come
伟大克苏鲁已到来
Silent Night
 Blasphemous Night
平安夜 亵渎的夜晚
Great Ones reign
 Death's in sight
旧日支配者主宰
死亡在望
Horrid beasties enslaving mankind
可怕的野兽奴役人类
Cosmic terror destroying your mind
宇宙的恐怖摧毁神智
We're all going to die
我们都要死亡。

Demon Sultan Azathoth
恶魔之王阿撒托斯
Bubbles in confusion.
激起混乱的气泡。Center of the Universe
在宇宙的中央
Sprouting foul protrusions.
污秽的苗床滋长。
Muffled madd'ning beating drums
低沉狂乱的鼓点
Hellish flutes a-playing
地狱的长笛尖啸
Round him dance the Other Gods
外神围绕他起舞
Voiceless
 mindless swaying.
无声的
盲目的摇摆。

Dance the cultists in their folly
狂信徒们痴愚起舞
Fa la la la la la la la la
法啦啦啦啦啦啦啦啦
'Tis the season to be jolly
欢乐节期已经到来
Fa la la la la la la la la
法啦啦啦啦啦啦啦啦
Watch them kill and disembowel
他们杀戮开膛剖肚
Fa la la la la la la la la
法啦啦啦啦啦啦啦啦
Troll a Yuletide carol foul
亵渎圣歌轮流唱开
Fa la la la la la la la la
法啦啦啦啦啦啦啦啦
See the blazing god before us
来见我们炽燃的神
Fa la la la la la la la la
法啦啦啦啦啦啦啦啦
Join us in our morbid chorus
加入我们扭曲的歌
Fa la la la la la la la la
法啦啦啦啦啦啦啦啦
Follow him in mindless prayer
跟随着他盲目祈祷
Fa la la la la la la la la
法啦啦啦啦啦啦啦啦
Great Cthugha in his lair
克图格亚伏于巢中
Fa la la la la la la la la
法啦啦啦啦啦啦啦啦。

Mi-Go we have heard on high
米戈歌唱在高天
Weirdly buzzing in their flight
振翅发出嗡嗡异响
Multitudes of antennae
成百上千的触须
Make strange voices in the night
在夜晚发出奇怪的声音
I-i-i-i-ia
Ia Shub-Niggurath
I-i-i-i-ia
Ia Shub-Niggurath!
Fungi, why this revelry?
真菌 为何这般欢庆？
Why collect our brains in cans?
为什么要把我们的大脑装进罐里？
What can your agenda be?
你有什么计划吗？
Authors of some eldritch plans.
怪异计划的创造者
I-i-i-i-ia
Ia Shub-Niggurath
I-i-i-i-ia
Ia Shub-Niggurath!

I'm dreaming of a dead city
我梦见一座死亡之城
Where Deep Ones swim in depths of night.
深潜者在夜晚的深处游泳
Where Cthulhu's sleeping while stars go creeping
克苏鲁在群星蠕动时入睡
Until the time when they are right.
直到它们再度归位
I'm dreaming of a dead city
我梦见一座死亡之城
With angles Euclid wouldn't know
具有欧几里得从未见过的角度
That was built strange eons ago
这诡异的万古的造物
and will soon come up from down below.
很快就会从深处浮起
I'm dreaming of a dark future
我梦见黑暗的未来
Ruled by that Three-Lobed Burning Eye;
被三叶的火红之眼统治
When the Old Ones' coming is nigh
旧日支配者来到眼前时
and you find that death itself may die.
你发现死亡本身亦会消逝。

O come, all ye Olde Ones,
来吧 旧日支配者们
Ithaqua and Glaaki;
伊塔库亚和格拉其
Come foul Tsathoggua and all nameless ones.
来吧 肮脏的札特瓜和其他无名的神们
Come Great Cthulhu, rising from the ocean.
来吧 伟大的克苏鲁
从海上升起吧
O come, let us implore them,
来吧 让我们向他们祈祷
We really can't ignore them,
我们真的不能忽视它们
O come, let us restore them,
来吧 让我们复兴它们
Great Olde Ones.
伟大的旧日支配者们
Their old dominion
它们曾经的领地
Mankind now rules blithely,
人们愉快地生活着
Stars turning overhead to mark out our doom.
星星高高地升起
预示着我们的厄运
They will return here, greedy and malevolent.
它们会贪婪的且坏心肠地回来
O come, let us restore them,
来吧 让我们复兴它们
Great Olde Ones.
伟大的旧日支配者们。

Here comes Yog-Sothoth
犹格·索托斯来了
Here comes Yog-Sothoth
犹格·索托斯来了
Quick let's try to hide!
赶快尝试隐藏
God he's huge! Those iridescent globes are six miles wide!
主啊 他真巨大！那些发光的球体有六米宽
He's just turned Dunwich to goo
他刚刚把郭威治变成了黏性物
And had it for a snack.
然后把它当成了小吃
He's gonna visit your hometown
他即将光临你们的故乡
So run and don't look back!
所以赶快逃命不要回头。

Kept under lock and key
在锁与钥匙的控制下
(In terrible gloom)
（在恐怖的黑暗中）
Necronomicon
死灵之书
(The first I exhumed)
（我最先发掘到的）
From the book room.
在那书屋中
Book of Eibon
伊波恩之书
(So frightfully old)
（古老得可怕）
Vermis Mysteriis
蠕虫的秘密
(A sight to behold)
（超凡而脱俗）
The Monstres and Their Kynde
怪物及其眷族
(With edges of gold)
（有着镀金的边）
Could make me lose my mind
能让我失去心智
(All covered with mold)
（所有的一切被霉菌掩盖)
Kitab al Azif
基塔布·阿尔·阿吉夫
(Its horrors untold)
（它不为人知的恐怖）
Still I am bold.
我依旧如此大胆
King in Yellow
黄衣之王
(Left me feeling glum)
（让我感到忧郁）
The Ponape Scriptures
波纳佩圣典
(I'd stay away from)
（我会远远的避开）
And then the Golden Bough
然后还有金枝
(My brain had gone numb)
（我的大脑已经麻木）
I read them all out loud
我大声地读出全部
Freed the Great Old Ones
释放旧日支配者
(Mankind will succumb)
（人类会屈服）
What have I done?
我到底做了什么？

We wish you a Scary Solstice
祝你至日害怕
We wish you a Scary Solstice
祝你至日害怕
We wish you a Scary Solstice
祝你至日害怕
And an eldritch New Year!
祝你新年诡秘
Weird cravings we bring
我们带来了怪异的祝愿
To you and your kin
送给你的每一位亲朋
Weird cravings for Solstice
至日的愿望怪异
And an eldritch New Year!
新年也如此诡秘
O bring us an icky pudding
哦给我们一份黏腻的布丁
O bring us an icky pudding
哦给我们一份黏腻的布丁
O bring us an icky pudding
哦给我们一份黏腻的布丁
Bereft of good cheer
要是没有祝愿
We won't go unless it's loathsome
我们就不会离开 除非它令人作呕
We won't go unless it's loathsome
我们就不会离开 除非它令人作呕
We won't go unless it's loathsome
我们就不会离开 除非它令人作呕
And dripping with fear
恐惧涓涓下滴
We wish you a Scary Solstice
祝你至日害怕
We wish you a Scary Solstice
祝你至日害怕
We wish you a Scary Solstice
祝你至日害怕
And an eldritch New Year!
祝你新年诡异！

The world in terror and madness lies
恐怖疯狂笼罩人世
Its ultimate doom is at hand
最终毁灭在眼前
How ineffectual are the cries
响彻在天地间的哭声
That uselessly ring through the land.
是多么徒劳无力
Oh heaven help us
 defend us Lord
天堂啊 援救我们
上帝啊
捍卫我们
From this most unthinkable fright
不受这不可名状的恐骇侵袭
But Heaven's empty or God has fled
可要么上帝已遁走
要么天堂空荡荡
Before the Great Old Ones' might!
哪敌威能广大的众旧日支配者！
For lo! The dark days are hasting on
全拜黑暗时代步步逼近
As Abdul Alhazred foretold:
阿尔哈兹莱德早预言：
When will the endlessly circling stars
何时周转群星尽归位
Return the Great Ones of old?
旧日支配者降临？
From far beyond the most distant space
来自深渊虚空之外
And nethermost caverns beyond
最深邃的洞穴之下
The Elder Ones will reclaim the place
万古前统治此地的古老者
They held strange eons ago.
将要取回旧日故土。

In lightless chambers beneath the waves
波涛下暗穴幽冥
Where never the light of day gleamed
日光此处未曾照耀
A billion hastening to their graves
亿万异物冲向坟墓
The great Cthulhu has dreamed.
伟大克苏鲁在此做梦
At night he whispered to those he could
夜中祂向能者低语
The time of his rising was near
祂苏醒的日子要来临
And though but few of them understood
理解深意的人无几何
Their hearts were crippled with fear.
侵心恐惧却尽数疯狂
In dreams he calls to us
 there we're his
噩梦深魇无可逃 祂向我们召唤
The veil between worlds wears thin.
世界间的屏障磨损殆尽
In dreams we've glimpsed what our cosmos is
噩梦深魇无可逃 宇宙真相得一瞥
And our position therein.
还有我们在其中的地位
The knowledge that the dark gods bestow
黑暗邪神赐予了知识
The end of all things has begun
万事终焉将要到来
The only mercy we'll ever know
而我们所知的唯一救赎
Is sweet annihilation!
只有仁慈的湮灭。

Alhazred Said that is not dead which can eternal lie!
阿尔哈兹莱德说
那永恒长眠的并非亡者！
The Arab said that is not dead for even death may die.
阿拉伯人说那并非亡者因为死亡也会消逝。
For even death my die
 my dear
 for even death may die!
因为死亡也会消逝
亲爱的
死亡也会消逝！
And on his own he penned a tome that is called the Al Azif!
他自己写了一本书
叫“阿尔·阿吉夫”！
The howling devils sang to him with fiendish songs of grief.

With fiendish songs of grief
 my dear
 with fiendish songs of grief!
唱着邪恶的悲歌
亲爱的
唱着邪恶的悲歌！
Then Unseen Demons killed him dead on a dry Damascus lawn!

在大马士革的枯草上！
His words live on for strange aeons
 the Necronomicon.
他的话语传扬在诡异的万古
死灵之书。The NECRONOMICON
 he wrote the Necronomicon!
“死灵之书”
他写下了那本死灵之书！
His words live on for strange aeons
 the Necronomicon.
他的话语传扬在诡异的万古
死灵之书。

From the damnable shadows of madness
自疯狂那可憎的阴影中
From the corpse-ridden hollow of Weir
自被尸体填满的维尔山谷
Comes a horrible message of gladness
传来了一则狂喜的可怖启示
And a ghost-guided poem of cheer
和一首妖异的欢呼诗
And a gloom-spouting pupil of Poe
以及爱伦▪坡那放射出忧郁的眼瞳
Sends the pleasantest wish of the year
送出了一年中最愉快的祝愿
May the ghouls of the neighbouring regions
附近一带的食尸鬼
And the cursed necrophagou things
和那些被诅咒的食腐者
Lay aside their dark habits in legions
将会把它们晦暗的习俗混入到人群中
Through all thy bright glorious days
在经历过你所有光辉灿烂的日子后
May the world and the mighty commend thee
整个世界和全部的盛赞都将属于你
And the cosmos resound with they praise
宇宙间将回响着他们的赞扬声
And may all future ages be brilliant
一切未来的岁月中都将会充满光芒
With the light of thine intellect's rays
充满你的智慧的光芒。

Hail Great Olde Ones and Outer Gods
称颂旧日支配者和外神们
foul pantheon of malice.于充斥恶意的邪恶神庙。
Your pseudopods and tentacles
你们的伪足与触手
shall make this world your palace.
要把这世界变为你们的宫殿。
You are not dead
 yet not alive
你们没有逝去
也并非活着
And any day
 you may arrive.
而你们也可能在任何一日到来。
Hail Yog Sothoth
 foul Yog Sothoth
称颂犹格索托斯
邪恶的犹格索托斯
the source of all our fears.
我们所有恐惧的根源。
Both gate and key
 a congerie of iridescent spheres.
既是门也是匙
聚集着的亿万光辉球体。
The boundaries of time and space
亦为时间与空间的边界。
You can command from any place.
你能从任何地方给出命令
Hail Azathoth
 blind Azathoth
称颂阿撒托斯
盲目的阿撒托斯
obtuse destructive urge.
迟钝而有害的推进。
the mindless frothing scourge.
愚笨发泡的天灾。
Your formless might awakens fright.
你那无形的威能激起恐惧。
Our scream will echo in the night.
我们的尖叫将在夜晚回响。

Now we're in the chamber where the ancint rites are held
现在我们身处古老仪式举行的房间里
Here beside the greenish flame your worship is compelled
在绿色的火焰裹挟之下燃烧你的崇敬
You're the honored guest of all And you'll join our festival And god bless you and help you to survive our festive rites
你是所有人的贵宾喔

是的！上帝会庇佑你安然度过我们的典会
Don your robe

take off your mask and bounce your byakhee

邪恶神灵注视着
You will soon hear his call for you're in our festival

If you're lucky you will forget till solstice comes again

直到您的再次光临~~~
Yes
forget until solstice comes again
是的
一忘皆空
直到您的再次光临~~~

Cultists dancing 'round an open fire.
狂信徒们正围着篝火跳舞
Nearby
 bobies decompose.旁边
是腐烂的尸体。
Tom toms beating
 ever higher and higher
鼓声规律地响起
声音甚至越来越大。
Their frenzied passion quickly grows.
他们狂热的激情迅猛增长。
Every cultist knows that chanting and a crazy dance

Mark the time when stars are right.

Faithful thralls
 as they bellow and prance

They know  Cthulhu's on his way.

And soon the Great Old One will rule once more
而很快旧日支配者将再度统治
And hold dominion as he held once before.
正如他之前所统治的一般
And so they offer up this sacrifice
所以他们祭献出祭品：
Of kids from one to ninety-two
从一岁至九十二的人类
And call to their god
 in words strange but concise
召唤他们的上帝
以奇怪却又简洁的语言
Iä fhtagn（Iä fhtagn）
Iä fhtagn Cthulhu。

From the lonely stars beyond the verge of universe

A sound is echoing
call from another world

(Dagon is here again)
大衮再临于此

（穹苍再绽光芒）
(Call of dagon)
（大衮的呼唤）

The cold comes
骤寒已至

淫鼠噬堵
The deadly sound of silence
逝者寂谣亦无声
As time decays
白驹败蹄骨已㱙
You try to name the unnameable

A whisperer in darkness

your books
